column2:
loans_clean_viz %>% 
  group_by(addr_state, loan_paid_flag) %>% 
  summarise(n = n()) %>% 
  mutate(prop = n/sum(n)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = addr_state, y = prop, fill = loan_paid_flag))+
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip()
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'addr_state'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
